holidays.title: Crab Soup Day
holidays.description: Feast on the region’s specialty, crab soup, a simple dish full of amazing flavors!

holidays.title: Lyndon Baines Johnson Day
holidays.description: We invite you to join us in celebrating the 36th President of the United States.

holidays.title: Moldova Independence Day
holidays.description: Let’s commemorate Moldova’s adoption of the Declaration of Independence!

holidays.title: National Petroleum Day
holidays.description: The impact of petroleum on civilization cannot be underestimated, which is why we celebrate this resource!

holidays.title: National Pots De Creme Day
holidays.description: Satisfy your sweet tooth by celebrating and indulging in this tasty custard dessert.

holidays.title: The Duchess Who Wasn't Day
holidays.description: Let's remember women like Margaret Wolfe Hungerford who worked in obscurity to make their voices heard.

holidays.title: Aaron Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this super-talented Hollywood star, the sky's the limit. Let’s celebrate him today!

holidays.title: Calvin Millan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the talented actor and his life on his birthday.

holidays.title: Lyndon B. Johnson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The contributions of this politician to the United States cannot be overstated.

holidays.title: Mario Barrett’s Birthday
holidays.description: Singer, songwriter, actor, dancer, and model — is there anything Mario Barret can’t do?

holidays.title: Mase’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper has had a huge impact on the world of hip hop!

holidays.title: Rod Wave’s Birthday
holidays.description: Besides his unique style, Rod Wave has a storytelling ability that not many artists have.

holidays.title: Savannah James’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young woman wears many hats: as a designer, Instagram star, and devoted mother.
